problem.markdown: Assuming that ultra high molecular weight polyethylene (UHMWPE) has neutral contact angle, then addition of carbon nanotubes (with lower surface energy) in UHMWPE matrix will tend to: ( ) Recover the lower surface energy (x) Increase the contact angle ( ) Retain the same contact angle ( ) Decrease the contact angle
